title: Scotts Bluff National Monument: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps          Downloading JPG For best results, right-click on the link to the JPG file and select "save target as" or "save link as" from the menu. This will open a window prompting you to select a location for the file on your computer. Depending on your computer's configuration, this may be the default action if you simply click on the link.              Scotts Bluff color park map Download JPG (150 k)           Scotts Bluff Topography Map Download JPG (3.3 M)           Oregon Trail Near Scotts Bluff Map Download JPG (204 k)           1958 Scotts Bluff Park Map Download JPG (284 k)
